programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep143
programme.desc: Tidying Up - Peppa and George have to tidy their bedroom. After a frenzy of cleaning, the room is tidy. The room doesn't stay tidy for long though.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep144
programme.desc: The Playground - Peppa and George go to the playground. Peppa's friends are also there. Peppa likes going on the swings but George does not because he's scared of heights, so Daddy Pig helps George go down the slide because it is too high and ends up getting stuck.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S1 Ep145
programme.desc: Daddy Puts Up a Picture - Daddy Pig offers to put up a picture of Peppa and George on the wall while Mummy Pig is out. He accidentally cracks the wall while doing it, so Peppa and George help Daddy Pig fix the wall before Mummy Pig comes home.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep113

She's scared something will happen and won't let them out. Barbamama must intervene to help the kittens.

programme.desc: The Treasure Hunt / Going into the Wild - Mr. Strict's twins visit the barbababies. But living in nature is more complicated than they expected.

programme.desc: Paddington Vs The Seagulls / Paddington And The Lighthouse - Paddington learns that seagulls love chips and will do anything to get them, but can he deliver lunch while it is still hot? // The lighthouse light is broken, and on a foggy night too, can Paddington help save the boat at sea?

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep105
programme.desc: Bouncy Tires - When Zeg the dinosaur truck accidentally puts on a set of Super Bouncy Tires, he bounces out of control! Now Blaze and AJ have to experiment to find a substance adhesive enough to stop their bouncing buddy.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1112
programme.desc: Pups Save the Baddies / Pups Save the Yumi Bee - Humdinger, Sid, and Sweetie have joined forces to try and take over the Lookout. // Humdinger sabotages Yumi's Bee costume sending her buzzing out of control.

It's up to the Paw Patrol to save him and his specs!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep323
programme.desc: Paddington's Adventure Club Cracks The Case! / Paddington And Aunt Lucy's Special Recipe - Paddington and his friends set out to help PC Wells solve the case of the missing Windsor Ruby. // Thanks to Aunt Lucy's Special recipe the Browns set up a takeaway business from their home, but it's hard work!

programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Beaver Home / The Crew Fixes A Road - The power is out in Builder Cove! programme.desc: Baked Apples / Vegetable Stew - Chef and Olly are about to make baked apples when two apples start behaving mysteriously. // Olly takes Chef camping for the first time. But when Chef tries to cook without the comforts of the Stump, he struggles with how different everything is.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep213
programme.desc: Meteor Madness - The Sharkpack are excited to watch the meteor shower on Foggy Springs's highest mountain, and Sharkdog knows the best way to get there. The only problem? Captain Quigley thinks she does too.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep214
programme.desc: Pest Friends Forever - Sharkdog has fleas! Sea fleas, that is. Max will do whatever it takes to get rid of them, but that may be tough because Sharkdog is so itchy, he can't sit still!

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep215

programme.desc: Cinnamon Buns / Souffl - For Chef's birthday, Chef and Olly follow clues on a journey that leads to a delicious surprise. // When a rumor spreads that Chef can't make a souffl, he is determined to show he can.

programme.desc: The Little Critters - The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S1 Ep107
programme.desc: Epic Sail - Crusher and Pickle challenge Blaze and his friends to a sailboat race. But when he tries to cheat, Crusher accidentally crashes both ships onto a tropical island! Blaze and his crew must find the missing pieces of their ship so they can sail home.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S8 Ep811
programme.desc: Pups vs. a Neon Humdinger / Pups Save a Royal Painting - When Mayor Humdinger's giant neon sign of himself gets loose, the Paw Patrol must stop it from rolling through town. // Sweetie steals a painting of the Princess and attempts to replace it with one of herself.

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1113
programme.desc: Pups Save the Big Book Delivery / Pups Save the Puppets - Humdinger's kitties make off with Mayor Goodway's book delivery truck. // Julius and Julia get into a sticky situation.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep124
programme.desc: A Mail Whale Tale / Swimming With The Sharks - When Baby and William help the Mail Whale with his deliveries, they find themselves on a whale of an adventure. // Baby and his family get their own reality TV show-- what could go wrong?

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep121
programme.desc: Greedyguts / Where is Bali? - A goat has escaped from the mountain and is coming to wreak havoc, devouring everything in its path! // Bali is nowhere to be found, and the Barbapapa deploy all their imagination to look for her. They have no idea that a nice surprise awaits them!

programme.title: The Adventures of Paddington S3 Ep324
programme.desc: Paddington's Football Dilemma / Paddington Has To Say Goodbye - Paddington has to choose between England and Peru before their football cup match, but he loves both places equally! // The time has come for Aunt Lucy to go home, but there's still time for one last adventure, or is there?

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep108
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Popcorn Caf / The Crew Fixes A Slippery Mess - Rubble & Crew switch to cleanup mode when construction on Caf Carl's new popcorn restaurant pops out of control. // A soapy accident causes slippery mayhem all over Builder Cove. Can the pups clean it up in time for Mayor Greatway's big jump?

programme.title: DORA S2 Ep212
programme.desc: Tongue Twisted Troll / Chompy and the Cloud Flower - Dora and Boots help Grumpy Old Troll untwist his tongue with Quickatoo's help. // Dora and Boots help Chompy find another Cloud Flower Seed after he accidentally eats Isa's.

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S6 Ep616
programme.desc: Special Mission Blaze - When a nefarious villain steals every toothbrush in Axle City, Blaze's only chance at saving the day is to become: Special Mission Blaze!

programme.title: The Tiny Chef Show S1 Ep101
programme.desc: Pizza / Bread - Tiny Chef makes pizza and learns that friendship is more important than toppings when Ruby eats all the basil! // Tiny Chef bakes bread but forgets to watch his rising dough and needs to think fast when the dough grows too big!

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep216
programme.desc: Ceviche for Dinner - When Dad's cool boss comes over for dinner, Max and Sharkdog both try to impress him. And they'll do whatever it takes.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep217
programme.desc: Surf's Up, Sharkdog! - When Sharkdog and Dennis get stuck together (literally!), Max must find a way to separate them before the big surf contest.

programme.title: Sharkdog S2 Ep218
programme.desc: A Star Fish Is Born - When Sharkdog steals the show in the new aquarium commercial, Max must overcome a serious case of jealousy.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S3 Ep309
programme.desc: Whale Songs / Tell-Tale Scooter - Hank gets a bad case of stage fright when his dad asks him to sing a song in the Whale Choir. // Baby Shark accidentally breaks William's new scooter and hides the evidence.

programme.title: Baby Shark's Big Show! S1 Ep118
programme.desc: William Manta: News Fish - While visiting Rayna at work, William learns what it takes to become a top-notch TV reporter

programme.title: PAW Patrol S11 Ep1115
programme.desc: Pups vs. The Robo-Ducky / Pups Save the Lost Penguin - Digi and Tal get stuck on top of a giant Robo-Ducky. // Chickaletta switches places with a Baby Penguin.

programme.title: Paw Patrol S9 Ep901
programme.desc: Liberty Makes a New Friend - Liberty mistakenly brings a bear into town, thinking it's someone's pet. She must fix her mistake and rescue Chickaletta.

programme.title: Rubble & Crew S1 Ep122
programme.desc: The Crew Builds A Giant Dam / The Crew Builds A Squirrel-Proof Farm - Rubble & Crew are on the job to save Builder Cove after a rainstorm threatens to flood the town. // Rubble and Motor come up with crafty construction solutions to fix Farmer Zoe's squirrel problem before the Farm Fair.

programme.title: Peppa Pig S4 Ep401
programme.desc: Freddy Fox - Peppa and her friends are playing hide and seek, but it is Freddy Fox with his super smelling nose who is the best at playing that game.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep101
programme.desc: The Barbapapa Tree / The Barbababies' Birthday - Barbapapa and Barbamama return to the tree they were born under. It's in bad condition. They must rescue it quickly without disturbing the nearby animals. // It's the Barbababies's birthday. They all want to do something different with Barbapapa!

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep208
programme.desc: Bbarbalalalalalala / The Biodisaster - Barbalala and the family life! / Barbabright and Barbabeau have designed a huge wooden toy powered by an engine using bio oil.

programme.title: Barbapapa - One Big Happy Family! S1 Ep120
programme.desc: Relay Tales - Barbalib, Barbalala and Barbabelle take turns as narrators to tell a story, each one bringing a very personal touch to it.

programme.title: BARBAPAPA - One Big Happy Family! S2 Ep209
programme.desc: The Little Critters - The Barbababies love bedtime stories, except if they are always the same...

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S5 Ep510
programme.desc: Deep Sea Grand Prix - For the first time ever, Blaze and AJ are racing under the ocean! Blaze transforms into a submarine and speeds through sunken ships and coral reefs to reach the giant sand castle at the finish line!

programme.title: Blaze and the Monster Machines S8 Ep801
programme.desc: The Pirate Grand Prix - It'sPegwheel the pirate'sfirst race-and who better to join him than Pirate Blaze! Can they beat Crusher to the trophy and prove they're the best racers on the seven seas, or will strong winds and high altitudes get the better of them?

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep7
programme.desc: The Sibling Badge - Roly reveals he's expecting a new baby brother or sister, and the Squirrels have questions.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep8
programme.desc: The Monster Badge - The Squirrels want to help Plinky find her scary side. Fortunately, Duggee has his monster badge.

programme.title: Hey Duggee S5 Ep9
programme.desc: The Diary Badge - The Squirrels find a dusty, old book behind a cupboard... it's Duggee's diary from when he was a teenager! The Squirrels are keen to write diaries of their own.

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep49
programme.desc: Go Jet Academy: Global Gameshow - It's the Go Jetters as you've never seen them before as they take part in a disco dazzling around the world gameshow!

programme.title: Go Jetters S2 Ep50
programme.desc: Horsetail Fall, California - The Go Jetters have travelled to Horsetail Fall in the Yosemite National Park to watch the 300m high waterfall become Firefall.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep18
programme.desc: Rain - When a heavy summer rain thunders over the Heeler home, Bluey is determined to dam the water in the front yard, while Mum tries to stop her constantly tracking mud into the house.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep19
programme.desc: Pizza Girls - Bluey and Bingo make mud pizzas and deliver them to the grown-ups, but their pedal car's wheel keeps falling off.

programme.title: Bluey S3 Ep20
programme.desc: Driving - With only five minutes to play 'Driving', Bluey and Mum race against the clock to buy milk for a grumpy guest and have to escape an angry shopkeeper.

programme.title: Teletubbies S1 Ep115
programme.desc: Where? There! - Laa-Laa and Po play a game of 'hide and seek'. They both take turns at hiding. Tinky Winky and Dispsy are hiding too and Laa-Laa and Po find them together.

programme.title: Teletubbies Ready Steady Go! S1 Ep8
programme.desc: Silly Things - Join the dance party with the Teletubbies! Tinky Winky, Dipsy, Laa-Laa and Po dance and sing about silly things that make them smile.

programme.title: Pop Paper City S1 Ep44
programme.desc: Mission Poppletoise - On today's poptastic adventure, Hooper find a Poppletoise on the beach. But when the Poppletoise's eggs start to hatch while she's away, can the friends find her in time?

programme.title: Dog Loves Books S1 Ep32
programme.desc: Dog Loves Bedtime Baboon - Dog and Pug go on an adventure to help Bedtime Baboon get all the young children around the world to sleep. They have to sprinkle moondust everywhere to help the children go to sleep.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep3
programme.desc: OKIDO in Bloom - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. The sky is full of big grey rain clouds in the real world. Messy watches his sandcastle outside get washed away by the pouring rain. Why does it have to rain? He competes in the OKIDO flower competition and finds out why.

programme.title: Messy goes to OKIDO S1 Ep4
programme.desc: Tastebuddies - Messy, a monster, explores science questions that children ask about the world around us. Someone pass Messy the tissues! He discovers that things just don't taste the same when he has a cold, especially his favourite chewy green socks - let's find out why.

programme.title: Kazoops! S1 Ep70
programme.desc: Jimmy Jones Rules - Monty tries to tell his family that Jimmy is not just a toy, but much more. Whether they believe him is another story.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep3
programme.desc: It's Time to Press a Flower - JoJo and Gran Gran press a flower so that it will last for a long time. JoJo learns that flowers wilt over time but flower pressing is a special way to make them last longer.

programme.title: JoJo & Gran Gran S2 Ep2
programme.desc: It's Time to Visit the Art Gallery - JoJo and Gran Gran visit the art gallery and join a tour with curator Marie to see lots of different types of art. JoJo realises art isn't just for looking at - it's for making too!

programme.desc: Bench Blocked - When Sarah and Duck's favourite bench is in use, the pair find other things to do.

programme.desc: Planetarium Aquarium - Sarah and Duck go to the aquarium to track down a waving fish.

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep15

programme.title: Bluey S1 Ep16
programme.desc: Yoga Ball - Bingo loves playing with Dad, but sometimes he forgets Bingo is smaller than her sister. Mum teaches Bingo how to use her big girl bark to keep the fun within her limits.

programme.title: Bual Bisnes #3 (Rpt)
programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.desc: Bual Bisnes merupakan sebuah program bual bicara santai dan berinformasi yang meneroka secara mendalam landskap perniagaan tempatan. Setiap episod memberi fokus kepada pelbagai sektor utama Perusahaan Kecil dan Sederhana (PKS) seperti F&B, automotif, kesihatan serta francais. Program ini menampilkan temu bual eksklusif bersama pakar industri, usahawan berjaya dan pemimpin perniagaan, bagi berkongsi pandangan, kisah kejayaan serta amalan terbaik. Matlamat utama Bual Bisnes adalah untuk mendidik penonton tentang peranan penting sektor perniagaan dalam menjana pertumbuhan ekonomi negara.

programme.title: DocFilm
programme.desc: Power of Secret Service - Intelligence agencies are influencing governments and spying on countries with no regard for the law. And they are able to remain nearly invisible, in the process. Are they the new superpowers? The last time intelligence agencies commanded as much power as they do today was during the Cold War. Technological innovations mean that more sophisticated warfare is now a reality. It is not just about Russia and the USA anymore. We may be entering a new era of unrest. The U.S. has lost more spies and informants since 2010 than at any other time since the Cold War. Leaders of German intelligence agencies also acknowledge that they have once again fallen upon tough times. Money, data and access are proving to be major factors in determining who actually wields power. The 2016 U.S. election made this clear: U.S. intelligence agencies are certain that Russian intelligence helped elect Donald Trump. But the U.S. has lost old spheres of influence and allies are increasingly pursuing their own agendas. Can President Biden make his country a force for order in the world, again? And what does that mean for political hot spots and potential conflicts with China, Iran, and Russia? And for allies like Saudi Arabia and Turkey? Will Western intelligence agencies regain the power they once exerted? Wars fought with drone and hacker attacks, increasingly delegated power, and surveillance could push these conflicts to their tipping point.

programme.title: Mapped Out
programme.desc: Why cant Ethiopia and Eritrea be friends? - Tensions are running high in Tigray, Ethiopias northernmost state, which is still reeling from a recent civil war. Different interests within the region have led neighbors Ethiopia and Eritrea into new strife. But there are other sources of friction between them - including a lot of history and Ethiopias renewed insistence on its need for sea access.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: The World Heritage Sites In Japan
programme.desc: An astonishing 49 burial mounds of various shapes and sizes are scattered across Osaka. These 1,600-year-old mounds are the resting places of past rulers and elites. Research reveals new discoveries.

programme.title: Okinawa: The Holiest Place
programme.desc: Okinawa Prefecture is a group of subtropical islands in the far south of Japan. We examine its past and present, with footage from time-lapse creator Shimizu Daisuke. This time: The Holiest Place.

programme.title: Grand Sumo Highlights
programme.desc: NHK WORLD-JAPAN presents a sumo highlights program for fans around the globe. Today the show features all top-division bouts from May 17th, Day 7 of the Grand Sumo Tournament in Tokyo.

programme.title: Sumopedia
programme.desc: Sumopedia enriches your sumo experience with information on the techniques, traditions and famous wrestlers of the past. The rules may be simple but there is a lot more to sumo than meets the eye.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Ekiben Japan
programme.desc: A bento from Akashi, Hyogo features a local octopus specialty.The container of this unique bento is also interesting as they're shaped the same as the pots used in traditional octopus fishing.

programme.title: Core Kyoto Mini
programme.desc: Miyama is famous for its roof thatching tradition. The town of Hanase continues to serve the local specialty, foraged, wild-food cuisine.

programme.title: Easy Japanese For Work
programme.desc: Accelerate your Japanese language skills! Learn practical, effective workplace expressions, understand business culture and improve your kanji.

programme.title: Zero Waste Life
programme.desc: Taoda Ayane does amazing things with milk cartons, transforming them into accessories, bags, and even clothing. The cartons are also strong and water-resistant, so her creations are practical, too.

programme.title: NHK Newsline
programme.desc: NHK NEWSLINE brings you up to date with the latest from Japan, Asia and around the world. Our team covers breaking news and major developments, with trusted anchors to tie it all together.

programme.title: Recipes To Soothe The Soul
programme.desc: After the death of her beloved husband, cooking expert Kurihara Harumi began looking for ways to deal with her grief. Now she works on "meals for one" recipes to help people cope with living alone.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Morales
programme.desc: Prelims - Perfect as a professional, Michael Morales is rapidly rising up the welterweight ladder, and on May 18, the 17-0 phenom will put his unbeaten record on the line when he faces his toughest test to date, perennial contender Gilbert Burns, in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Neil Magny, Ecuadors Morales now has his sights on Brazils Burns, a former world title challenger determined to score the win and get back in the championship chase at 170 pounds.

programme.title: UFC Fight Night: Burns vs. Morales
programme.desc: Main Event - Perfect as a professional, Michael Morales is rapidly rising up the welterweight ladder, and on May 18, the 17-0 phenom will put his unbeaten record on the line when he faces his toughest test to date, perennial contender Gilbert Burns, in the main event of UFC Fight Night at the APEX in Las Vegas. Fresh from a Performance of the Night knockout of Neil Magny, Ecuadors Morales now has his sights on Brazils Burns, a former world title challenger determined to score the win and get back in the championship chase at 170 pounds.

programme.title: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS
programme.desc: LALIGA TOP GOALS ENRIQUE DE LUCAS - Predatory finishing & net-busting missiles from long range. A celebration of Quique de Lucas one of LaLigas longest serving attacking talents.

programme.title: UFC 315: Muhammad vs. Della Maddalena
programme.desc: Prelims - The Octagon returns to Montreal, Quebec, Canada for the first time since 2015, and on May 11, fans at the Bell Centre will be treated to a stacked card headlined by a championship doubleheader. In the main event of UFC 315, Belal Muhammad defends his welterweight crown for the first time against Australian powerhouse Jack Della Maddalena. Perfect in seven trips to the Octagon, including five post-fight bonus-winning efforts, Della Maddalena is determined to bring a title down under, but in Muhammad, he will be facing a fighter who is undefeated for over six years while beating the best of the best at 170 pounds. In the co-main event, Valentina Shevchenko begins her second reign atop the flyweight division when she tackles top French contender Manon Fiorot

programme.desc: Program pencarian bakat bola sepak yang hebat diteruskan lagi dengan Musim Ke-4. Program ini mencungkil bakat bola sepak anak-anak muda berusia bawah 14 tahun dan bawah 16 tahun.

programme.title: Sensasi Bola Ep27
programme.desc: Sensasi Bola merupakan satu program bual bicara berdurasi setengah jam bersama pemain bola sepak, selebriti, jurulatih dan peminat sebagai tetamu undangan setiap minggu. Antara topik menarik yang akan dikupas adalah isu mengenai bola sepak tempatan dan antarabangsa, temubual ekslusif bersama lagenda bola sepak, tips kesihatan serta isu semasa yang menjadi perbualan masa kini.
